title: [K-12] CALL-Based Second Language Word Recognition and Learning Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Second-Language Vocabulary and Grammar Comprehension
context.additional_context: Performing chunk-based speech-text reconstruction tasks using VR-based language learning applications in a BYOD environment, with differentiated feedback based on learner proficiency levels

learning_goals: Learners can improve second-language word recognition accuracy (WRS) by 20% or more.
Learners can acquire ten or more academic vocabulary words by reconstructing spoken text step-by-step.
Learners can complete simulation tasks in VR environments with 80% or higher accuracy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
